data.title:

Multiple reports confirm the 86-year-old Supreme Leader was killed in today’s U.S.-Israeli strikes on Tehran. Khamenei had led the Islamic Republic for 35 years.

data.title: Fox News: The US believes Iranian Supreme Leader Khamenei is dead.
data.description: According to Fox News: U.S. officials have confirmed that the U.S. believes Iranian Supreme Leader Ayatollah Khamenei and five to ten other senior Iranian leaders were killed in the first wave of Israeli attacks on a residence. (Jinshi)

data.title: Bitcoin Derivatives Market Hits High Bear Sentiment as $1.8 Billion in Sell Volume Hits in One Hour
data.description:
Bitcoin’s derivatives market pressure index has dropped to its High Bear Sentiment threshold on the CryptoQuant chart, coinciding with $1. 8 billion in aggressive sell volume hitting derivatives markets within a single hour as U. S. -Iran tensions escalated and panic selling accelerated through the final sessions of February
source: https://www.ethnews.com/bitcoin-derivatives-market-hits-high-bear-sentiment-as-1-8-billion-in-sell-volume-hits-in-one-hour/

data.title: GEOPOLITICS | UAE's Jebel Ali Port Reportedly Attacked
data.description: Iranian state media has released a video claiming that the Jebel Ali Port in the United Arab Emirates has been attacked. According to Jin10, the report did not provide further details on the nature or extent of the alleged attack. The Jebel Ali Port is one of the largest and busiest ports in the Middle East, playing a crucial role in regional trade and logistics. The implications of such an incident could be significant, affecting trade routes and regional stability. Further information and official confirmations are awaited to assess the situation accurately.

data.title: Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps announced the closure of the Strait of Hormuz, but Britain says it remains open.
data.description: Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps announced the closure of the Strait of Hormuz, but the UK's Maritime Trade Operations Office has informed us that the strait remains open, though caution is advised when navigating it. As of now, no official statement has been issued by Iran regarding this matter.

data.title: Europe’s Largest Asset Manager Just Increased Its Strategy Stake by 373%
data.description:
Amundi, Europe’s largest asset manager with over 2. 3 trillion euros in assets under management, expanded its position in Strategy by 373% quarter-over-quarter according to Q4 2025 regulatory filings disclosed in late February 2026, bringing its total stake to approximately 4. 79 million shares valued at $641 million
source: https://www.ethnews.com/europes-largest-asset-manager-just-increased-its-strategy-stake-by-373/

data.title: A senior Israeli official claims Khamenei is dead; Iran says its enemies are resorting to psychological warfare.
data.description: Multiple Israeli media outlets reported that a senior Israeli official stated that "Iranian Supreme Leader Ayatollah Khamenei died in an Israeli airstrike against Iran," and that images of his body had been shown to Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. Reuters reported that a senior Israeli official revealed that Khamenei's body had been found. US media also reported that the Israeli ambassador to Washington informed US officials that Khamenei had died in an Israeli attack on his residence. Iranian state media, however, quoted the head of public relations for the Supreme Leader's office as saying, "The enemy is resorting to psychological warfare; everyone should be vigilant."

data.title: U.S. President Trump Discusses War Strategy Options
data.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has outlined his approach to handling ongoing conflicts, stating that he has the option to either engage in a prolonged military campaign or conclude the war within a few days. According to Jin10, Trump's remarks highlight the strategic choices available to the U.S. administration in addressing international military engagements. The President's comments reflect the broader considerations of military involvement and the potential for swift resolution versus extended operations.

data.title: Industry Leader Emphasizes Integrity in Cryptocurrency Sector
data.description: Jeff Yan, the founder of Hyperliquid, recently emphasized the critical importance of maintaining integrity and fairness in the cryptocurrency industry. According to NS3.AI, Yan warned against compromising these core values for cost-saving measures, highlighting the risks involved in taking shortcuts. His remarks underscore the necessity of upholding ethical standards within the sector.

data.title: GEOPOLITICS | Oman Urges Iran to Respect Sovereignty and International Law
data.description: Oman's Ministry of Foreign Affairs has called on Iran to respect the sovereignty of nations, adhere to international law, and maintain good neighborly relations with Gulf countries. According to Jin10, this appeal comes amid ongoing regional tensions and highlights the importance of diplomatic engagement and cooperation in the Gulf region. Oman's statement underscores the need for peaceful coexistence and mutual respect among neighboring countries to ensure stability and security in the area.

data.title: S&P 500 Companies Fall Short of Historical EPS Estimates in Q4
data.description: In the fourth quarter, 73% of S&P 500 companies surpassed their earnings per share (EPS) estimates, according to FactSet posted on X. This figure falls below the five-year average of 78% and the ten-year average of 76%, indicating a weaker performance compared to historical standards. The data highlights a trend where fewer companies are exceeding expectations, which may reflect broader economic challenges or shifts within the market. Analysts and investors are closely monitoring these results to gauge the overall health and future outlook of the market.

data.title: GEOPOLITICS | Israeli Prime Minister Claims Iranian Supreme Leader Removed
data.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced on the evening of February 28 that there are numerous indications suggesting the removal of Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei. According to Jin10, Netanyahu stated that the day's military operations had successfully eliminated several key figures involved in Iran's nuclear program. He emphasized that Israel will continue to target multiple Iranian sites in its ongoing efforts.
